q: Q1. What is the main focus of Email Marketing?

options.opt: Engaging with customers through email communication
options.val: Engaging with customers through email communication

q: Q2. Which of the following is NOT a common goal of an Email Marketing campaign?
Q3. True or False: Email Marketing is primarily about sending as many emails as possible to reach a wide audience.
Q4. Which of the following is an essential aspect of a successful email campaign?

options.opt: Including as much information as possible in one email
options.val: Including as much information as possible in one email

options.opt: Using flashy and colorful designs to grab attention
Personalizing the content based on the recipient's interests
options.val: Personalizing the content based on the recipient's interests

options.opt: Sending emails at random times throughout the day
options.val: Sending emails at random times throughout the day

q: Q5. What is an 'open rate' in Email Marketing?

options.opt: The percentage of emails that bounce back
The percentage of emails that are marked as spam
options.val: The percentage of emails that are marked as spam

options.opt: The percentage of emails that are successfully delivered to the recipient's inbox
options.val: The percentage of emails that are successfully delivered to the recipient's inbox

options.opt: The percentage of recipients who open and view the email
options.val: The percentage of recipients who open and view the email

q: Q6. True or False: It's essential to get explicit permission from recipients before adding them to an email list.

options.opt: A legal disclaimer at the end of the email
options.val: A legal disclaimer at the end of the email

options.opt: A request for the recipient to take a specific action, such as clicking a link or making a purchase
options.val: A request for the recipient to take a specific action, such as clicking a link or making a purchase

options.opt: A way to unsubscribe from the email list
options.val: A way to unsubscribe from the email list

options.opt: A link to the company's social media profiles
options.val: A link to the company's social media profiles

q: Q8. True or False: A/B testing in Email Marketing involves sending two versions of the same email to different recipients.
Q9. Which of the following can negatively impact email deliverability?

options.opt: Regularly cleaning and updating the email list
options.val: Regularly cleaning and updating the email list

options.opt: Providing an unsubscribe option in the email
options.val: Providing an unsubscribe option in the email

q: Q10. How can you measure the success of an Email Marketing campaign?

options.opt: By the number of emails sent
options.val: By the number of emails sent

options.opt: By the number of clicks on any link in the email
options.val: By the number of clicks on any link in the email

options.opt: By the percentage of emails opened and the click-through rate
options.val: By the percentage of emails opened and the click-through rate

options.opt: By the size of the email list
options.val: By the size of the email list

q: Q11. True or False: Email Marketing is only effective for B2C (business-to-consumer) companies.
Q12. What is the purpose of the formula '=VLOOKUP (A2, B1:C10, 2, FALSE)' in Excel?

options.opt: It searches for the value in cell A2 in the range B1 to C10 and returns the corresponding value from the second column (B) if found.
options.val: It searches for the value in cell A2 in the range B1 to C10 and returns the corresponding value from the second column (B) if found.

options.opt: It looks up the value in cell A2 in the range B1 to C10 and returns the value from the third column (C) if found.
options.val: It looks up the value in cell A2 in the range B1 to C10 and returns the value from the third column (C) if found.

options.opt: It finds the maximum value in the range B1 to C10.
options.val: It finds the maximum value in the range B1 to C10.

options.opt: It counts the occurrences of the value in cell A2 in the range B1 to C10.
options.val: It counts the occurrences of the value in cell A2 in the range B1 to C10.

Q14. Which of the following is the primary function of SMTP in e-blasts?
Q15. Which email header is used to indicate the recipient of the email in SMTP?
